column2: "Oho. Come to think of it, you obtained that power once upon a time."
"Having the complete Dark Falz ensemble before me is rather delightful."
"Haa!"
"Hah!"
"Hmh!"
"Ahahah!"
"However, have you forgotten? About the origin of that power?"
"The Dark Falz were born of [Profound Darkness]."
"In other words, theirs is [Profound Darkness]'s power."
"Children cannot triumph against their parents."
"ARKS. Dark Falz. All of them are under my dominion."
"...How disappointing."
"That appearance... are you a Dark Falz?"
"I am not familiar with your existence..."
"Regardless, you pose no threat to me."
"My liege, above you!"
"Haa!"
"Tch!"
"You stopped my attack. How splendid."
"...I sense no Photons. Are you not an ARKS?"
"What are you? What is your purpose?"
"I apologize for my rudeness. I am Phaleg Ives. I have hastened here from Earth."
"I was drawn to the presence of a great strength and came to meet it."
"Earth... That planet from another dimension."
"I am personally unopposed to continuing the fight like this, but I cannot leave everyone here... If you would please excuse us."
"May we meet again someday."
"My liege, are you unhurt?"
"Do not fret. I was merely taken aback by the presence of a foe unaffected by Photons."
"So long as I remain aware of such beings, they will not pose a threat."
"...Shall we pursue them? Should they reactivate that barrier, it could prove to be a threat."
"No, the time for games has ended. Mitra stated as much."
"We need only persist on our path of destruction. All worlds, and all dimensions shall be offered up."
